vox.text: Welcome to the Dinogen Arena tutorial.
Here you will learn the basics of gameplay.
Use the keyboard to move and the mouse to look around.
Remember, all controls can be changed in the settings menu by pressing [ESC] at any time.
Tutorial objectives will be displayed at the left of the screen.
Move your character to the firing range by following the arrow on screen.
The minimap is located at the top left corner of the screen.
Teammates, enemies, and other items of interest will be displayed here.
Many objects in the world can be interacted with.
Simply move up to an interactable object and press the interact key on the keyboard.
Interact with the ammo crate.
Click the mouse to fire your weapon.
Press [SPACE] to use your knife attack.
Destroy the targets on the firing range.
Dinogen Arena features many different weapon types.
Pick up the SMG.
Your current inventory and ammo are displayed at the top right corner of the screen.
Pressing [Q] will switch your current weapon.
Destroy the targets.
Explosives are also a powerful addition to your arsenal.
Try using the M203 grenade launcher against the targets.
Move on to the next area.
Your current health is displayed at the bottom of the screen.
Press the button to self-inflict some damage.
After taking damage, your health is recovered after a few seconds without taking further damage.
You can sprint by holding [SHIFT] on the keyboard.
You can't fire your weapon while sprinting.
Move on to the next area.
Some game modes allow you to play as a dinosaur.
There are many dinosaur species available, each with their own abilities.
The raptor is a deadly hunter with a good balance of speed, health, and damage.
Just like your character, use the keyboard to move and the mouse to attack.
Destroy the target.
Nice work. This concludes the tutorial.
Complete the mission by leaving the firing range.
